# vite-plugin-html-minify

Vite plugin for customizable HTML minification

## Install

Using npm:

```console
npm i --save-dev vite-plugin-html-minify
```

Using pnpm:

```console
pnpm add -D vite-plugin-html-minify
```

## Usage

```js
import { defineConfig } from 'vite'
import vitePluginHtmlMinify from 'vite-plugin-html-minify'

export default defineConfig({
  plugins: [
    vitePluginHtmlMinify()
  ]
})
```

That's all, now all HTML files will be minified.

## Options

The options completely duplicate [`minify` function from `html-minifier-terser`](https://github.com/terser/html-minifier-terser?tab=readme-ov-file#options-quick-reference).
